name: BULBASAUR
descriptionText:
A strange seed was

planted on its

back at birth.

The plant sprouts

and grows with

this POKéMON.

name: IVYSAUR
descriptionText:
When the bulb on

its back grows

large, it appears

to lose the

ability to stand

on its hind legs.

name: VENUSAUR
descriptionText:
The plant blooms

when it is

absorbing solar

energy. It stays

on the move to

seek sunlight.

name: CHARMANDER
descriptionText:
Obviously prefers

hot places. When

it rains, steam

is said to spout

from the tip of

its tail.

name: CHARMELEON
descriptionText:
When it swings

its burning tail,

it elevates the

temperature to

unbearably high

levels.

name: CHARIZARD
descriptionText:
Spits fire that

is hot enough to

melt boulders.

Known to cause

forest fires

unintentionally.

name: SQUIRTLE
descriptionText:
After birth, its

back swells and

hardens into a

shell. Powerfully

sprays foam from

its mouth.

name: WARTORTLE
descriptionText:
Often hides in

water to stalk

unwary prey. For

swimming fast, it

moves its ears to

maintain balance.

name: BLASTOISE
descriptionText:
A brutal POKéMON

with pressurized

water jets on its

shell. They are

used for high

speed tackles.

name: CATERPIE
descriptionText:
Its short feet

are tipped with

suction pads that

enable it to

tirelessly climb

slopes and walls.

name: METAPOD
descriptionText:
This POKéMON is

vulnerable to

attack while its

shell is soft,

exposing its weak

and tender body.

name: BUTTERFREE
descriptionText:
In battle, it

flaps its wings

at high speed to

release highly

toxic dust into

the air.

name: WEEDLE
descriptionText:
Often found in

forests, eating

leaves.

It has a sharp

venomous stinger

on its head.

name: KAKUNA
descriptionText:
Almost incapable

of moving, this

POKéMON can only

harden its shell

to protect itself

from predators.

name: BEEDRILL
descriptionText:
Flies at high

speed and attacks

using its large

venomous stingers

on its forelegs

and tail.

name: PIDGEY
descriptionText:
A common sight in

forests and woods.

It flaps its

wings at ground

level to kick up

blinding sand.

name: PIDGEOTTO
descriptionText:
Very protective

of its sprawling

territorial area,

this POKéMON will

fiercely peck at

any intruder.

name: PIDGEOT
descriptionText:
When hunting, it

skims the surface

of water at high

speed to pick off

unwary prey such

as MAGIKARP.

name: RATTATA
descriptionText:
Bites anything

when it attacks.

Small and very

quick, it is a

common sight in

many places.

name: RATICATE
descriptionText:
It uses its whis-

kers to maintain

its balance.

It apparently

slows down if

they are cut off.

name: SPEAROW
descriptionText:
Eats bugs in

grassy areas. It

has to flap its

short wings at

high speed to

stay airborne.

name: FEAROW
descriptionText:
With its huge and

magnificent wings,

it can keep aloft

without ever

having to land

for rest.

name: EKANS
descriptionText:
Moves silently

and stealthily.

Eats the eggs of

birds, such as

PIDGEY and

SPEAROW, whole.

name: ARBOK
descriptionText:
It is rumored that

the ferocious

warning markings

on its belly

differ from area

to area.

name: PIKACHU
descriptionText:
When several of

these POKéMON

gather, their

electricity could

build and cause

lightning storms.

name: RAICHU
descriptionText:
Its long tail

serves as a

ground to protect

itself from its

own high voltage

power.

name: SANDSHREW
descriptionText:
Burrows deep

underground in

arid locations

far from water.

It only emerges

to hunt for food.

name: SANDSLASH
descriptionText:
Curls up into a

spiny ball when

threatened. It

can roll while

curled up to

attack or escape.

name: NIDORAN♀
descriptionText:
Although small,

its venomous

barbs render this

POKéMON dangerous.

The female has

smaller horns.

name: NIDORINA
descriptionText:
The female's horn

develops slowly.

Prefers physical

attacks such as

clawing and

biting.

name: NIDOQUEEN
descriptionText:
Its hard scales

provide strong

protection. It

uses its hefty

bulk to execute

powerful moves.

name: NIDORAN♂
descriptionText:
Stiffens its ears

to sense danger.

The larger its

horns, the more

powerful its

secreted venom.

name: NIDORINO
descriptionText:
An aggressive

POKéMON that is

quick to attack.

The horn on its

head secretes a

powerful venom.

name: NIDOKING
descriptionText:
It uses its

powerful tail in

battle to smash,

constrict, then

break the prey's

bones.

name: CLEFAIRY
descriptionText:
Its magical and

cute appeal has

many admirers.

It is rare and

found only in

certain areas.

name: CLEFABLE
descriptionText:
A timid fairy

POKéMON that is

rarely seen. It

will run and hide

the moment it

senses people.

name: VULPIX
descriptionText:
At the time of

birth, it has

just one tail.

The tail splits

from its tip as

it grows older.

name: NINETALES
descriptionText:
Very smart and

very vengeful.

Grabbing one of

its many tails

could result in a

1000-year curse.

name: JIGGLYPUFF
descriptionText:
When its huge eyes

light up, it sings

a mysteriously

soothing melody

that lulls its

enemies to sleep.

name: WIGGLYTUFF
descriptionText:
The body is soft

and rubbery. When

angered, it will

suck in air and

inflate itself to

an enormous size.

name: ZUBAT
descriptionText:
Forms colonies in

perpetually dark

places. Uses

ultrasonic waves

to identify and

approach targets.

name: GOLBAT
descriptionText:
Once it strikes,

it will not stop

draining energy

from the victim

even if it gets

too heavy to fly.

name: ODDISH
descriptionText:
During the day,

it keeps its face

buried in the

ground. At night,

it wanders around

sowing its seeds.

name: GLOOM
descriptionText:
The fluid that

oozes from its

mouth isn't drool.

It is a nectar

that is used to

attract prey.

name: VILEPLUME
descriptionText:
The larger its

petals, the more

toxic pollen it

contains. Its big

head is heavy and

hard to hold up.

name: PARAS
descriptionText:
Burrows to suck

tree roots. The

mushrooms on its

back grow by draw-

ing nutrients from

the bug host.

name: PARASECT
descriptionText:
A host-parasite

pair in which the

parasite mushroom

has taken over the

host bug. Prefers

damp places.

name: VENONAT
descriptionText:
Lives in the

shadows of tall

trees where it

eats insects. It

is attracted by

light at night.

name: VENOMOTH
descriptionText:
The dust-like

scales covering

its wings are

color coded to

indicate the kinds

of poison it has.

name: DIGLETT
descriptionText:
Lives about one

yard underground

where it feeds on

plant roots. It

sometimes appears

above ground.

name: DUGTRIO
descriptionText:
A team of DIGLETT

triplets.

It triggers huge

earthquakes by

burrowing 60 miles

underground.

name: MEOWTH
descriptionText:
Adores circular

objects. Wanders

the streets on a

nightly basis to

look for dropped

loose change.

name: PERSIAN
descriptionText:
Although its fur

has many admirers,

it is tough to

raise as a pet

because of its

fickle meanness.

name: PSYDUCK
descriptionText:
While lulling its

enemies with its

vacant look, this

wily POKéMON will

use psychokinetic

powers.

name: GOLDUCK
descriptionText:
Often seen swim-

ming elegantly by

lake shores. It

is often mistaken

for the Japanese

monster, Kappa.

name: MANKEY
descriptionText:
Extremely quick to

anger. It could

be docile one

moment then

thrashing away

the next instant.

name: PRIMEAPE
descriptionText:
Always furious

and tenacious to

boot. It will not

abandon chasing

its quarry until

it is caught.

name: GROWLITHE
descriptionText:
Very protective

of its territory.

It will bark and

bite to repel

intruders from

its space.

name: ARCANINE
descriptionText:
A POKéMON that

has been admired

since the past

for its beauty.

It runs agilely

as if on wings.

name: POLIWAG
descriptionText:
Its newly grown

legs prevent it

from running. It

appears to prefer

swimming than

trying to stand.

name: POLIWHIRL
descriptionText:
Capable of living

in or out of

water. When out

of water, it

sweats to keep

its body slimy.

name: POLIWRATH
descriptionText:
An adept swimmer

at both the front

crawl and breast

stroke. Easily

overtakes the best

human swimmers.

name: ABRA
descriptionText:
Using its ability

to read minds, it

will identify

impending danger

and TELEPORT to

safety.

name: KADABRA
descriptionText:
It emits special

alpha waves from

its body that

induce headaches

just by being

close by.

name: ALAKAZAM
descriptionText:
Its brain can out-

perform a super-

computer.

Its intelligence

quotient is said

to be 5,000.

name: MACHOP
descriptionText:
Loves to build

its muscles.

It trains in all

styles of martial

arts to become

even stronger.

name: MACHOKE
descriptionText:
Its muscular body

is so powerful, it

must wear a power

save belt to be

able to regulate

its motions.

name: MACHAMP
descriptionText:
Using its heavy

muscles, it throws

powerful punches

that can send the

victim clear over

the horizon.

name: BELLSPROUT
descriptionText:
A carnivorous

POKéMON that traps

and eats bugs.

It uses its root

feet to soak up

needed moisture.

name: WEEPINBELL
descriptionText:
It spits out

POISONPOWDER to

immobilize the

enemy and then

finishes it with

a spray of ACID.

name: VICTREEBEL
descriptionText:
Said to live in

huge colonies

deep in jungles,

although no one

has ever returned

from there.

name: TENTACOOL
descriptionText:
Drifts in shallow

seas. Anglers who

hook them by

accident are

often punished by

its stinging acid.

name: TENTACRUEL
descriptionText:
The tentacles are

normally kept

short. On hunts,

they are extended

to ensnare and

immobilize prey.

name: GEODUDE
descriptionText:
Found in fields

and mountains.

Mistaking them

name: GRAVELER
descriptionText:
Rolls down slopes

to move. It rolls

over any obstacle

without slowing

or changing its

direction.

name: GOLEM
descriptionText:
Its boulder-like

body is extremely

hard. It can

easily withstand

dynamite blasts

without damage.

name: PONYTA
descriptionText:
Its hooves are 10

times harder than

diamonds. It can

trample anything

completely flat

in little time.

name: RAPIDASH
descriptionText:
Very competitive,

this POKéMON will

chase anything

that moves fast

in the hopes of

racing it.

name: SLOWPOKE
descriptionText:
Incredibly slow

and dopey. It

takes 5 seconds

for it to feel

pain when under

attack.

name: SLOWBRO
descriptionText:
The SHELLDER that

is latched onto

SLOWPOKE's tail

is said to feed

on the host's left

over scraps.

name: MAGNEMITE
descriptionText:
Uses anti-gravity

to stay suspended.

Appears without

warning and uses

THUNDER WAVE and

similar moves.

name: MAGNETON
descriptionText:
Formed by several

MAGNEMITEs linked

together. They

frequently appear

when sunspots

flare up.

name: FARFETCH'D
descriptionText:
The sprig of

green onions it

holds is its

weapon. It is

used much like a

metal sword.

name: DODUO
descriptionText:
A bird that makes

up for its poor

flying with its

fast foot speed.

Leaves giant

footprints.

name: DODRIO
descriptionText:
Uses its three

brains to execute

complex plans.

While two heads

sleep, one head

stays awake.

name: SEEL
descriptionText:
The protruding

horn on its head

is very hard.

It is used for

bashing through

thick ice.

name: DEWGONG
descriptionText:
Stores thermal

energy in its

body. Swims at a

steady 8 knots

even in intensely

cold waters.

name: GRIMER
descriptionText:
Appears in filthy

areas. Thrives by

sucking up

polluted sludge

that is pumped

out of factories.

name: MUK
descriptionText:
Thickly covered

with a filthy,

vile sludge. It

is so toxic, even

its footprints

contain poison.

name: SHELLDER
descriptionText:
Its hard shell

repels any kind

of attack.

It is vulnerable

only when its

shell is open.

name: CLOYSTER
descriptionText:
When attacked, it

launches its

horns in quick

volleys. Its

innards have

never been seen.

name: GASTLY
descriptionText:
Almost invisible,

this gaseous

POKéMON cloaks

the target and

puts it to sleep

without notice.

name: HAUNTER
descriptionText:
Because of its

ability to slip

through block

walls, it is said

to be from an-

other dimension.

name: GENGAR
descriptionText:
Under a full moon,

this POKéMON

likes to mimic

the shadows of

people and laugh

at their fright.

name: ONIX
descriptionText:
As it grows, the

stone portions of

its body harden

to become similar

to a diamond, but

colored black.

name: DROWZEE
descriptionText:
Puts enemies to

sleep then eats

their dreams.

Occasionally gets

sick from eating

bad dreams.

name: HYPNO
descriptionText:
When it locks eyes

with an enemy, it

will use a mix of

PSI moves such as

HYPNOSIS and

CONFUSION.

name: KRABBY
descriptionText:
Its pincers are

not only powerful

weapons, they are

used for balance

when walking

sideways.

name: KINGLER
descriptionText:
The large pincer

has 10000 hp of

crushing power.

However, its huge

size makes it

unwieldy to use.

name: VOLTORB
descriptionText:
Usually found in

power plants.

Easily mistaken

name: ELECTRODE
descriptionText:
It stores electric

energy under very

high pressure.

It often explodes

with little or no

provocation.

name: EXEGGCUTE
descriptionText:
Often mistaken

for eggs.

When disturbed,

they quickly

gather and attack

in swarms.

name: EXEGGUTOR
descriptionText:
Legend has it that

on rare occasions,

one of its heads

will drop off and

continue on as an

EXEGGCUTE.

name: CUBONE
descriptionText:
Because it never

removes its skull

helmet, no one

has ever seen

this POKéMON's

real face.

name: MAROWAK
descriptionText:
The bone it holds

is its key weapon.

It throws the

bone skillfully

like a boomerang

to KO targets.

name: HITMONLEE
descriptionText:
When in a hurry,

its legs lengthen

progressively.

It runs smoothly

with extra long,

loping strides.

name: HITMONCHAN
descriptionText:
While apparently

doing nothing, it

fires punches in

lightning fast

volleys that are

impossible to see.

name: LICKITUNG
descriptionText:
Its tongue can be

extended like a

chameleon's. It

leaves a tingling

sensation when it

licks enemies.

name: KOFFING
descriptionText:
Because it stores

several kinds of

toxic gases in

its body, it is

prone to exploding

without warning.

name: WEEZING
descriptionText:
Where two kinds

of poison gases

meet, 2 KOFFINGs

can fuse into a

WEEZING over many

years.

name: RHYHORN
descriptionText:
Its massive bones

are 1000 times

harder than human

bones. It can

easily knock a

trailer flying.

name: RHYDON
descriptionText:
Protected by an

armor-like hide,

it is capable of

living in molten

lava of 3,600

degrees.

name: CHANSEY
descriptionText:
A rare and elusive

POKéMON that is

said to bring

happiness to those

who manage to get

it.

name: TANGELA
descriptionText:
The whole body is

swathed with wide

vines that are

similar to sea-

weed. Its vines

shake as it walks.

name: KANGASKHAN
descriptionText:
The infant rarely

ventures out of

its mother's

protective pouch

until it is 3

years old.

name: HORSEA
descriptionText:
Known to shoot

down flying bugs

with precision

blasts of ink

from the surface

of the water.

name: SEADRA
descriptionText:
Capable of swim-

ming backwards by

rapidly flapping

its wing-like

pectoral fins and

stout tail.

name: GOLDEEN
descriptionText:
Its tail fin

billows like an

elegant ballroom

dress, giving it

the nickname of

the Water Queen.

name: SEAKING
descriptionText:
In the autumn

spawning season,

they can be seen

swimming power-

fully up rivers

and creeks.

name: STARYU
descriptionText:
An enigmatic

POKéMON that can

effortlessly

regenerate any

appendage it

loses in battle.

name: STARMIE
descriptionText:
Its central core

glows with the

seven colors of

the rainbow. Some

people value the

core as a gem.

name: MR. MIME
descriptionText:
If interrupted

while it is

miming, it will

slap around the

offender with its

broad hands.

name: SCYTHER
descriptionText:
With ninja-like

agility and speed,

it can create the

illusion that

there is more

than one.

name: JYNX
descriptionText:
It seductively

wiggles its hips

as it walks. It

can cause people

to dance in

unison with it.

name: ELECTABUZZ
descriptionText:
Normally found

near power plants,

they can wander

away and cause

major blackouts

in cities.

name: MAGMAR
descriptionText:
Its body always

burns with an

orange glow that

enables it to

hide perfectly

among flames.

name: PINSIR
descriptionText:
If it fails to

crush the victim

in its pincers,

it will swing it

around and toss

it hard.

name: TAUROS
descriptionText:
When it targets

an enemy, it

charges furiously

while whipping its

body with its

long tails.

name: MAGIKARP
descriptionText:
In the distant

past, it was

somewhat stronger

than the horribly

weak descendants

that exist today.

name: GYARADOS
descriptionText:
Rarely seen in

the wild. Huge

and vicious, it

is capable of

destroying entire

cities in a rage.

name: LAPRAS
descriptionText:
A POKéMON that

has been over-

hunted almost to

extinction. It

can ferry people

across the water.

name: DITTO
descriptionText:
Capable of copying

an enemy's genetic

code to instantly

transform itself

into a duplicate

of the enemy.

name: EEVEE
descriptionText:
Its genetic code

is irregular.

It may mutate if

it is exposed to

radiation from

element STONEs.

name: VAPOREON
descriptionText:
Lives close to

water. Its long

tail is ridged

with a fin which

is often mistaken

for a mermaid's.

name: JOLTEON
descriptionText:
It accumulates

negative ions in

the atmosphere to

blast out 10000-

volt lightning

bolts.

name: FLAREON
descriptionText:
When storing

thermal energy in

its body, its

temperature could

soar to over 1600

degrees.

name: PORYGON
descriptionText:
A POKéMON that

consists entirely

of programming

code. Capable of

moving freely in

cyberspace.

name: OMANYTE
descriptionText:
Although long

extinct, in rare

cases, it can be

genetically

resurrected from

fossils.

name: OMASTAR
descriptionText:
A prehistoric

POKéMON that died

out when its

heavy shell made

it impossible to

catch prey.

name: KABUTO
descriptionText:
A POKéMON that

was resurrected

from a fossil

found in what was

once the ocean

floor eons ago.

name: KABUTOPS
descriptionText:
Its sleek shape is

perfect for swim-

ming. It slashes

prey with its

claws and drains

the body fluids.

name: AERODACTYL
descriptionText:
A ferocious, pre-

historic POKéMON

that goes for the

enemy's throat

with its serrated

saw-like fangs.

name: SNORLAX
descriptionText:
Very lazy. Just

eats and sleeps.

As its rotund

bulk builds, it

becomes steadily

more slothful.

name: ARTICUNO
descriptionText:
A legendary bird

POKéMON that is

said to appear to

doomed people who

are lost in icy

mountains.

name: ZAPDOS
descriptionText:
A legendary bird

POKéMON that is

said to appear

from clouds while

dropping enormous

lightning bolts.

name: MOLTRES
descriptionText:
Known as the

legendary bird of

fire. Every flap

of its wings

creates a dazzling

flash of flames.

name: DRATINI
descriptionText:
Long considered a

mythical POKéMON

until recently

when a small

colony was found

living underwater.

name: DRAGONAIR
descriptionText:
A mystical POKéMON

that exudes a

gentle aura.

Has the ability

to change climate

conditions.

name: DRAGONITE
descriptionText:
An extremely

rarely seen

marine POKéMON.

Its intelligence

is said to match

that of humans.

name: MEWTWO
descriptionText:
It was created by

a scientist after

years of horrific

gene splicing and

DNA engineering

experiments.

name: MEW
descriptionText:
So rare that it

is still said to

be a mirage by

many experts. Only

a few people have

seen it worldwide.

name: MISSINGNO.
descriptionText: コメント　さくせいちゅう
